title: Do you know what this All Capital Letters font is?
content:
I have been trying to figure out what this font is but am failing miserably. Does anyone recognize it? Note the fancy ’&’ symbol. Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [0824091406.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090905065546/http:/typophile.com/files/0824091406.jpg) | 211.03 KB |
author: kristenr

comments.content: Possibly Goudy Old Style stretched horizontally.

Certainly looks like a version of Goudy with Horz Scaling for the text but the “&” looks like a variation of [New Baskerville Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20090905065546/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-new-baskerville/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26seed%3D33%26dock%3D0%26size%3D186%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3D%2526%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dsingle%252Cot.liga)
